tool_description: Free API to get Amazon product metadata. Product details, Reviews, Offers, and Search Queries.
title: Basic Amazon Scraper

api_list.name: GET Product Search Results
api_list.description: GET Product Search Results: Get product offers from a search query.

api_list.name: GET Product Offers
api_list.description: GET Product Offers: Get all offers available for a product.

api_list.name: GET Product Reviews
api_list.description: GET Product Reviews: Get all product reviews for a product.

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.description: GET Product Details: Get all details pertaining to a product ID (ASIN)
